pr_title: [Transform] add support for unsigned_long data type

timeline.message:
add support for unsigned_long, which required a change in
writing out integer results properly, because coerce is not
supported for unsigned_long

fixes #63871

timeline.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText: its referring to the mathematical definition of integer, that's why integer type, not integer. I can try to find a better name, maybe dropFloatingPointComponentIfNeeded, but lets not over-complicate it, the doc string defines what it does.
replies.author: hendrikmuhs

timeline.bodyText:
Its weird to me that there is not a blanket map doc value -> indexable value :(
This works in a pinch, I wonder if there is anyway to use DocValueFormat.UNSIGNED_LONG_SHIFTED.
But looking at it, there isn't a clean cut solution :/
timeline.author: benwtrent
